com.greenfabric.system
Class GnuInfo

java.lang.Object
  com.greenfabric.system.GnuInfo
public class GnuInfo
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains the knowledge needed to make decisions or detect certain things about the GNU aspects of the environment.

Author:
Robb Shecter, robb@acm.org

Constructor Detail

GnuInfo

public GnuInfo()
Method Detail

isGnu

public static boolean isGnu()
Return true if the current operating system is one known to be based on the GNU software utilities. Specifically, it checks if the current OS is Linux or FreeBSD.

findExecutable

public static java.io.File findExecutable(java.lang.String execName)
Tries to locate the given executable in the standard executable directories. To-do: Cache the answers given.

Returns:
the file if found and readable, or null if not.
